code: import React,{useState}from'react';import styles from'./Cadastro.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Cadastro=()=>{const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[name,setName]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:3000/cadastro',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({username,password,name,email})});const data=await response.json();if(!response.ok){throw new Error(data.message||'Erro ao cadastrar usu치rio');}alert('Usu치rio cadastrado com sucesso!');}catch(error){alert(error.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cadastro-container",children:[" ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Cadastro"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"name",children:"Nome:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"name",value:name,onChange:event=>setName(event.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:"Email:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",id:"email",value:email,onChange:event=>setEmail(event.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"username",children:"Username:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"username",value:username,onChange:event=>setUsername(event.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"password",children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",id:"password",value:password,onChange:event=>setPassword(event.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn-submit",type:"submit",children:"Cadastrar"})," "]})]});};export default Cadastro;
